question: During salat are there any faults in which we have to repeat the namaz and Sajda Sahu is nor permissible. Please list all
answer:
QUESTION
to repeat the namaz and Sajda Sahu is nor permissible. Please list all. Should the sleeves of shirt be without button or buttons are also permissible
ANSWER


Share:
In principle, if a person omits a Fardh act in Salaat intentionally or unintentionally, the Salaat will be invalid. He cannot compensate for that by performing Sajda-e-Sahw. He has to repeat the Salaat.

Similarly, if a person omits a Waajib act in Salaat intentionally, he cannot make up for that through Sajda-e-Sahw. A person may make Sajda-e-Sahw only if he omits a Waajib act in Salaat unintentionally. If a person?s sleeves are without buttons, and the loose sleeves do not distract a person in Salaat, it will be permissible.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
